description.en: Here you will find the vocabulary from Unit 8 Lesson C in the Four Corners 1 coursebook, such as "aquarium", "there", "water park", etc.
description.id: Di sini Anda akan menemukan kosakata dari Unit 8 Lesson C di Four Corners 1 Course, seperti "Aquarium", "There", "Water Park", dll.

en.long: a large place where people go and pay to have fun and enjoy games, rides, or other activities

id.long: Tempat besar di mana orang pergi dan membayar untuk bersenang -senang dan menikmati permainan, wahana, atau kegiatan lainnya

en.long: a large container usually made of glass that is filled with water in which fish and other sea creatures are kept

id.long: wadah besar yang biasanya terbuat dari kaca yang diisi dengan air di mana ikan dan makhluk laut lainnya disimpan

en.long: a place where we go to watch movies

id.long: tempat di mana kita pergi menonton film

en.long: a place where important cultural, artistic, historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

id.long: Tempat di mana objek budaya, artistik, historis, atau ilmiah yang penting disimpan dan ditunjukkan kepada publik

en.long: knowledge about the structure and behavior of the natural and physical world, especially based on testing and proving facts

id.long: Pengetahuan tentang struktur dan perilaku dunia alami dan fisik, terutama berdasarkan pengujian dan pembuktian fakta

en.long: the middle part or point of an area or object

id.long: bagian tengah atau titik suatu area atau objek

en.long: a specially designed structure that holds water for people to swim in

id.long: Struktur yang dirancang khusus yang menahan air bagi orang untuk berenang

en.long: a large park with swimming pools, water slides, etc. that people go to swim and have fun

id.long: Taman besar dengan kolam renang, slide air, dll. Orang -orang pergi berenang dan bersenang -senang

en.long: a place where many kinds of animals are kept for exhibition, breeding, and protection

id.long: tempat di mana banyak jenis hewan disimpan untuk pameran, pembiakan, dan perlindungan

en.long: at a place that is not where the speaker is

id.long: di tempat yang bukan tempat pembicara berada
